description:
A zero trust software-defined mesh network secured with quantum-safe cryptography

CyberHive Connect provides a Trusted Area Network - a zero trust software-defined mesh network secured with quantum-safe cryptography.
Connect features high performance with low latency and fast reconnects. It is simple and scalable, with easy setup and administration.
CyberHive Connect release 3.7.2 is now available for Linux and Windows.
New features:
- Raise TAN routing metrics so that link-local routes take priority over a coincidental Subnet Behind Endpoint route.
